entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except southeast 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
